pkgmetadata.longdescription: Phase I Shewhart X-Bar Chart // The purpose of 'PH1XBAR' is to build a Phase I Shewhart X-Bar control chart with variance components model in R. More details can be found: Yao and Chakraborti (2020) doi: 10.1002/qre.2793, and Yao and Chakraborti (2021) doi: 10.1080/08982112.2021.1878220.
